q_en: What are the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Expert Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group named "Expert Cutters"

steps.sql: ['SELECT * FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '4' AND start_time > '2024-05-01';']
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks for the working group "Expert Cutters" that will start after May 1, 2024
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '['SELECT * FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '4' AND start_time > '202' at line 1")
